extensionDescription.message: Add search engines easily and search from the context menu and convenient popup

AddCustomSearchMenuTooltip.message: Enable the context-menu item "Add Custom Search" on INPUT elements. Disable to prevent a tiered menu in some cases

SearchActionsBackgroundTabKeepOpen.message: Open In Background Tab (Keep Menu Open)

ColumnsTooltip.message: Maximum number of search engine icons per row (grid view)

ColumnsMinimumTooltip.message: Minimum number of search engine icons per row (grid view)

MenuSizeTooltip.message: Scaled size of the popup menu. Values greater than 100% will enlarge the whole menu (good for high-resolution displays)

IconSizeTooltip.message: Scaled size of search engine icons. At 200%, icons fill their container entirely

OpeningClosingDescription.message: Choose how to open Quick Menu

EnableOnTextBoxesTooltip.message: Enable on textarea and input elements

MouseTooltip.message: Select text and open using a mouse button

MouseDescription.message: Select your preferred method and button

HoldTooltip.message: Menu will open after holding the selected mouse button for ~0.25 seconds

SearchOnMouseupTooltip.message: Perform a search from the QuickMenu on mouseup vs click i.e. Hold to open menu, release to search

ClickTooltip.message: Popup menu will open on right-click.  Hold button for default context menu

KeyboardTooltip.message: Select text and open using the keyboard

ChooseKeyTooltip.message: Select text and press a key to open the popup menu. Click the adjacent button and press your preferred key

CloseAfterSearchTooltip.message: Close menu after performing a search.  Disable if you frequently search using multiple engines or prefer to close the menu manually. Can be superseded by 'Keep Menu Open' under Search Actions

CloseOnScrollTooltip.message: Close menu by scrolling or using the mouse wheel

MouseHelp.message: Linux and MacOS X environments where the default context menu is opened on mousedown vs mouseup can set 'ui.context_menus.after_mouseup = true' in about:config ( Firefox ) for mouse actions to work properly and prevent unwanted menus. Other users can select an option to change the way the default context menu is opened, either holding atl, ctrl, or shift, or by double-clicking the right mouse button. Not all options will work with all platforms.

HorizontalOffsetTooltip.message: Number of pixels to offset the popup menu horizontally. Numbers greater than zero move right, less than zero left

VerticalOffsetTooltip.message: Number of pixels to offset the popup menu vertically. Numbers greater than zero move down, less than zero up

ToolsPositionTooltip.message: Choose where to display the tools in the Quick Menu

ToolsHelp.message: click to disable | drag to re-order

SearchEnginesManagerHelp.message: Drag & drop to re-order, right-click menu to add/delete/modify

ImportDescription.message: Browse to your profile folder and select your search.json.mozlz4 file

EnableAutoImportTooltip.message: Import new OpenSearch engines to ContextSearch automatically. Only useful when importing OpenSearch engines installed through Firefox's Search Engine API. Requires a separate app. See 'Help' for more details

NameTooltip.message: Unique name for this search engine

DescriptionTooltip.message: Short description of the search engine. 1024 characters max

TemplateTooltip.message: The URL of the form submit function. If this is a GET engine, {searchTerms} must appear (e.g. http://example.com/?q={searchTerms})

FormPathTooltip.message: Typically the website homepage or the URL the form appears on

POSTparamsTooltip.message: List of POST parameters and values separated by ampersands (e.g. q={searchTerms}&lang=en&maxresults=100) Only applicable when using POST method

IconTooltip.message: URI of the icon to be used. Images should be less than 64x64 pixels and must be less than 10kb

EncodingTooltip.message: Character encoding required by the search form. Typically UTF-8

NewEngineAdded.message: New search engine added to ContextSearch

NewEngineAddedTooltip.message: Install this search engine to the Firefox search toolbar using a custom OpenSearch API

AlsoAdd.message: Also add to Firefox Search Engines?

CannotCreate.message: Cannot create a search engine from this input

MustImport.message: If an OpenSearch engine was installed you must import it into ContextSearch using the Import file browser.

InstallOfficialTooltip.message: Install the official OpenSearch engine for the current website

LoadingRemoteContentFail.message: Failed to load %1 icon(s). This can occur when Tracking Protection is enabled

LoadingRemoteContentTimeout.message: Fetching remote icons timed out. Some icons were not loaded.

EnterUniqueName.message: Enter a unique name for this search engine

TemplateMissingeMessage.message: Unable to find a template for this search form. You can try doing a search and copying the resulting URL here, replacing your search terms with {searchTerms}

DescriptionSizeError.message: Description must be 1024 or fewer characters

FormPathURLError.message: Form path must be an URL

BookmarksPermissionMessage.message:
After closing this prompt you will receive a prompt to accept a new permission for "Bookmarks".

Accepting will add a new folder "ContextSearch Menu" containing your current search engines in bookmarks under the "Other Bookmarks" folder. There you can add separators and group bookmarks into subfolders.

Do not rename the search engine bookmarks as this will cause them to stop working. Deleted bookmarks can be added again from ContextSearch Options->Search Engines. Clicking the bookmark icons in the search engine list can add or remove bookmarks.

NativeAppImportError.message: Failed to load file (%1) Is app installed?

ErrorParsing.message:
Error parsing %1
If you continue to receive this error, it's likely your Content Security Policy settings

SearchWith.description: title in context menu when searching

AddSearchEngines.description: title in context menu when no search engines installed

PositionRelativeToCursor.description: quick menu opening position relative to the mouse cursor. %1 is top|bottom, %2 is left|center|right

NameExists.description: short message for duplicate engine names

NameInvalid.description: short error for bad engine name

SearchBarTooltip.message: Choose where to display the search bar in the Quick Menu

Copy.description: button to duplicate a search engine from the manager

HotkeyTooltip.message: Open the Quick Menu any time using a hotkey

Focus.description: label for auto focus on search bar

FocusTooltip.message: Set focus to search bar when the Quick Menu is opened

SelectTextTooltip.message: Select all text in the search bar when it receives focus
SelectTextTooltip.description: description for select text in search bar

NameChangeWarning.message: Renaming search engines can cause duplicate entries when importing Firefox search engines from Firefox using manual or automatic import. This can be fixed by removing engines with the old name from Firefox Options-> Search-> Search Engines or simply hide the unwanted engine. Are you sure you want to rename?
NameChangeWarning.description: warn user about potential problems when changing search engine names

PressKey.description: short message to display when waiting for user to set a hotkey for opening the quick menu

ClearSearchHistory.description: Options label / context menu entry for clearing search history

ClearSearchHistoryTooltip.message: Clear search history from the search toolbar

ShowSuggestions.description: Options label / context menu entry for toggling suggestions for the toolbar

ShowSuggestionsTooltip.message: Fetch search suggestions from Google and display with search history in the search toolbar

SearchBarUseOldStyle.description: Options label for using the old Firefox style of search bar

SearchBarUseOldStyleTooltip.message: Display search engines in a single column with labels. Overrides columns setting

ToolbarSearch.description: Section label for the browser action search bar

SearchBarCloseAterSearchTooltip.message: Close the menu after performing a search

PerformASearchHeader.description: header message for the msgbox requesting the user perform a search

PerformASearch.message: Click OK and perform a new search using the form you are attempting to add
PerformASearch.description: message for the msgbox requesting the user perform a search

PerformASearchTooltip.message: The form does not contain the information necessary to build a search engine. Perform a simple search to have ContextSearch look for a valid search template. It is best to use words that would not normally appear in a search url. Do not use "search", "http", other common url words or the website name

Back.description: title attribute for the back button displayed inside a subfolder in the quick menu; aka return, previous folder, etc

SearchActionsOpenFolder.description: SELECT option label for opening quick menu folder

DisabledByHotkeys.description: message for search bar focus option when hotkeys are enabled

AddOpenSearchEngine.description: label for edit form button to install the current search engine as a Firefox Search Engine

ShortcutKey_tooltip.message: Key to expand the "Search With..." menu in the context menu

RowsTooltip.message: Maximum number of rows to display on opening (grid view)

RowsSingleColumnTooltip.message: Maximum number of rows to display on opening (text view)

ContextMenuHotKey.description: Label for Context Menu shortcut key

ContextMenuHotKeyTooltip.message: Access key for the ContextSearch submenu
ContextMenuHotKeyTooltip.description: Description for Context Menu shortcut key

EnableHistoryTooltip.message: Remember search terms and display them with search suggestions

SideBarTooltip.message: Sidebar is an extension of the Toolbar with added functions displayed inside the browser window. Both the menu and the opening widget respond to text drag & drop ( except Chrome ). Most settings are shared with the Toolbar

SideBarPositionTooltip.message: Choose where to display the side bar

SideBarWidgetEnable.description: label for displaying the sidebar icon

SideBarWidgetEnableTooltip.message: Overlay an icon for opening the sidebar
SideBarWidgetEnableTooltip.description: description for displaying the sidebar icon

SideBarHotkeyTooltip.message: Open the Sidebar any time using a hotkey

InitialOpacity.description: label for setting Quick menu opening opacity

InitialOpacityTooltip.message: Quick menu opens with a lower opacity and becomes opaque on mouseover

AutoMaxChars.description: label for setting maximum selected characters for auto open

AutoMaxCharsTooltip.message: Do not open Quick menu if selection is over (n) characters in length. 0 = no limit

EnableAnimationsTooltip.message: Enable resize, slide-in, opacity animations for all menus. Disable for faster interface with no eye candy

ThemeTooltip.message: Theme to use with Quick, Toolbar, and Sidebar menus

SideBarStartOpen.description: label for opening the sidebar when the page loads

SideBarStartOpenTooltip.message: Open the sidebar automatically when the page loads

OCSEDeleteWarning.message: Firefox Search Engines cannot be deleted. Hide to disable
OCSEDeleteWarning.description: alert message when attempting to delete a ocse from the manager

Links.description: Links can be searched as the text displayed or the url they refer to. Hold CTRL to toggle from the default setting

LinksTooltip.message: Links can be searched as the text displayed or the url they refer to. Hold CTRL to toggle from the default setting

ContextMenuTooltip.message: Enable searching via the context menu

SidebarTypeTooltip.message: Choose how to display the side bar. Overlay creates a floating window over page content. Panel creates a sidebar the height of the window and pads the document to avoid covering page content

HighlightTooltip.message: Highlight search terms in search results page

HighlightSeparateWordsTooltip.message: Highlight each word in multi-word search separately. Disable to treat phrases as a single search term

UserStylesTooltip.message: Apply custom CSS styling to menus

ToolbarTooltip.message: Open a search menu from the toolbar action button. Shares search actions with the Quick Menu

ConfirmResetAllSearchEngines.message:
This will remove all custom search engines, folders, bookmarklets, separators and restore the default engine list.

Are you sure?

AddingSearchEnginesInfoMessage.message: Search engines can be added manually here or automatically via the Context Menu. See the following link for more info -

SelectTimeoutTooltip.message: Time (in milliseconds) to allow after the last selection to cancel the popup. 0 = no limit

highlightfollowdomaintooltip.message: Continue highlighting pages on the search results website

highlightfollowexternallinkstooltip.message: Continue highlighting on external websites linked from the search results page

findbarpositiontooltip.message: Choose where to display the Find bar

FindBarEnableHotkey.message: Open the Find bar using a hotkey. Selected text will be highlighted immediately if found

highlightflashselectedtooltip.message: Flash the currently active search term

findbarstartopen.message: Open the Find bar automatically when the page loads

highlightaccuracytooltip.message: Words can be matched partially where searching 'lor' would match 'lorem', or exactly where only the complete word 'lor' will be highlighted

sidebarhidefullscreentooltip.message: Hide the Sidebar when in fullscreen

highlightignorepunctuationtooltip.message: Ignore punctuation - Setting this option would match WORLDS, WORLD'S and WO'RLDS. One or more apostrophes between the letters would still produce a match (e.g. W'O''R'L'D'S)

highlightstyletooltip.message: Style the highlighting using background / foreground colors or underlines. Choosing 'underline' will ignore text color values

findbarwindowtypetooltip.message: Choose how to display the find bar. Find bar window style can be toggled by double-clicking the dock / undock / move icon or by dragging

findbarkeyboardtimeout.message: Perform search after typing has stopped for n milliseconds. Values too low can cause performance issues. 0 = disabled

enabledisplayprevioussearchtooltip.message: Display the last used search terms in the search box

FindBarOpenInAllTabs.message: Open and close findbar across all tabs

ToolsAsToolbar.message: Display tools in a separate toolbar

findbarsearchinalltabs.message: Search all tabs when using the findbar ( note: type timer will be disabled )

NotificationOpenSidebar.message: open sidebar to see search results

simpleclicktooltip.message: Click a word to open menu. No selection required

HideContextMenu.message: Hide the default context menu when opening the Quick Menu using right-click

HoldForContextMenu.message: Hold right button ~1s and release for default context menu

DefaultViewToolTip.message: Set the default display mode for the menu. Each folder view can be set separately using the grid / list tool or by editing the folder in the search engines manager

AddUsingFirefoxSearchBar.message: Firefox 78+ Users - Add your engine using the Firefox Search bar

SyncWithFirefoxSearch.message: Disable all ContextSearch engines, subfolders, bookmarklets, etc and only display search engines installed to the Firefox Search bar

FFEngineExists.message: $1 already installed to Firefox Search bar

ContexMenuShowLastUsedToolTip.message: Show the last-used search engine at the top of the menu

ContexMenuShowRecentlyUsedToolTip.message: Show recently used engines at the top of the menu

ClearSearchList.message: Clear Search Engine List and Sync With Firefox Search Bar

CannotEditOneClickEngines.message: Firefox engines must be imported before making changes

hotkeystooltip.message: Select text and press a key to search. Hotkeys can be set in the Search Engines tab

pagetilesdescription.message: Drag and drop text to a full-page tiled menu of search engines ( experimental )

EnableHotkeysDescription.message: Enable hotkeys anytime except when editing content ( disable to allow hotkeys only when a ContextSearch menu is in focus )

faviconFinder.message: Find favicons by checking the host site ( opens a background tab )

uploadfromlocal.message: Use an image from your computer

ClosePageTilesOnShake.message: Close Page Tiles by shaking the mouse

ShowFolderSearch.message: Show an option to search the entire folder at the top of the menu

OpenOnDragTooltip.message: Drag text / links / images to open

HighlightLimitTooltip.message: Limit the number of matches to highlight. A lower limit can prevent slowdowns when marking. 0 = no limit

requestPermissionsMessage.message: An optional permission is required. Click the request button below.

RegexTooltip.message: Modify the search terms using regex before submitting. Multiple replacements can be chained, one per line

MatchSearchTermsRegexTooltip.message: Display this engine in the Regex Matches folder if the search terms match the following regex

SearchCodeTooltip.message: Run some javascript after opening the template URL. Global variable 'searchTerms' represents the current search

ConfirmDeleteCustomSearchEngines.message: This will delete all custom search engines, folders, bookmarklets, separators, etc. Are you sure?

exportToFirefoxSearchTooltip.message: Browse to your profile folder and select your search.json.mozlz4 file. You will be prompted with two files: a new search.json.mozlz4 file and a backup of your original file. Save both files to your profile directory. Restart Firefox to see the changes.

addSearchProviderHideNotificationTooltip.message: Notice for Firefox users to add opensearch engines using the Firefox search bar

alwaysAllowTileRearrangingTooltip.message: Always allow tiles to be rearranged in the menus

autoCopyTooltip.message: Selected text is copied to the clipboard

autoPasteFromClipboardTooltip.message: Text in the clipboard is pasted to searchbars when search menus are opened

cacheTooltip.message: cache search engine icons from their URLs

uncacheTooltip.message: Delete search engine icon cache only for search engines containing icon URLs. Warning: URLs will not be checked for bad or invalid before removing cache

warningCache.message: some icons could not be cached

cacheIconsMaxSizeTooltip.message: Max width or height to resize icons for caching

contextMenuContextualLayoutFlattenLimitT.message: Remove subfolders and flatten menu if only n number of engines are to be shown. 0 = no limit

contextMenuHotkeysTooltip.message: Append hotkey to context menu items using (&A) format for quick access

contextMenuRegexMatchedEnginesTooltip.message: Show regex matching engines at the top of the menu

contextMenuTitleTooltip.message: Override context menu title. Use %s in place of searchTerms. blank = default

contextMenuUseContextualLayoutTooltip.message: Display the context menu in subfolders according to the current context

contextMenuUseInnerTextTooltip.message: Use the inner text of an element as the search term when no text is selected

disableNewTabSortingTooltip.message: Enable to let the browser decide how to sort new search result tabs. Useful to prevent conflicts with tab managers

exportWithoutBase64IconsTooltip.message: Exported configs are smaller by excluding icon data URIs. May cause custom icons to be lost

forceOpenResultsTabsAdjacentTooltip.message: Force search results to appear in next tab to the right

groupFolderRowBreaksTooltip.message: Enable to show inline group folders as block elements

groupLabelMoreTileTooltip.message: Show the more / less icon for group folders inside the label tile vs using a separate tile

omniboxDefaultToLastUsedEngineTooltip.message: Default to the most recent search engine used with the omnibox

openFoldersOnHoverTimeoutTooltip.message: Number of milliseconds to hover before opening a folder. 500 = default, 0 = disabled

quickMenuAllowContextMenuNewTooltip.message: Systems that display the context menu on mousedown vs mouseup may need to select an alternative opening method, or modify the way the context menu is opened.

quickMenuAutoMaxCharsTooltip.message: Maximum number of characters to be selected and still open the quick menu using the Auto method. Selecting more that the number will not open the menu. 0 = no limit

quickMenuAutoTimeoutTooltip.message: Cancels opening the quick menu if pausing for a set number of milliseconds before releasing the mouse button. 0 = disabled

quickMenuCancelDeadzoneTooltip.message: How many pixels you can move the mouse before cancelling opening the quick menu using HOLD

quickMenuDomLayoutTooltip.message: Override the quick menu layout using a comma-separated list of HTMLElement ids, e.g. ( menuBar, searchBarContainer, optionsBar, quickMenuElement, titleBar, toolBar ). Not all ids need be used. Any listed will be moved to the end of the DOM tree. blank = default

quickMenuFocusOnOpenTooltip.message: set focus to the quick menu after opening

quickMenuHideSeparatorsInGridTooltip.message: hide separators when using the quick menu in grid view

quickMenuHoldTimeoutTooltip.message: Time in millisections to hold a mouse button before opening the quick menu using HOLD

quickMenuOpeningOpacityTooltip.message: Transparency level of the quick menu when opened. Becomes opaque on hover

quickMenuPreventPageClicksTooltip.message: Prevent mouse events on the current webpage while the quick menu is open

quickMenuRegexMatchedEnginesTooltip.message: Show regex matching engines at the top of the menu

quickMenuSearchOnMouseUpTooltip.message: Allows a search to be performed from the quick menu on mouseup without requiring a mousedown. Useful when opening the menu on Hold and releasing the mouse on a search tile to perform a search.

quickMenuShowRecentlyUsedTooltip.message: Show recently used engines at the top of the menu

quickMenuOnSimpleClick_useInnerTextToolt.message: Use the inner text of an element as the search term when no text is selected

quickMenuToolbarRowsTooltip.message: Maximum number of tool rows to display. 0 = no limit

quickMenuToolsLockPersistTooltip.message: The state of the lock tool will be remembered across sessions

quickMenuToolsRepeatSearchPersistTooltip.message: The state of the repeat search tool will be remembered across sessions

rememberLastOpenedFolderTooltip.message: Open menus to the last folder used

rightClickMenuOnMouseDownFixTooltip.message: Require a double-click to display the default context menu when using HOLD right mouse button to open the quick menu. Useful for preventing errant menus on systems that display the context menu on mouse down vs mouse up

searchBarHistoryLengthTooltip.message: Maximum number of history entries to store

searchBarSuggestionsCountTooltip.message: Maximum number of Google suggestions to include

shakeSensitivityTooltip.message: Sensitivity for detecting a shake. Lower = more sensitive

sideBar_openOnResultsTooltip.message: Open the sidebar on search results tabs

sideBar_openOnResultsMinimizedTooltip.message: Open the sidebar on search results tabs minimized

sideBar_rememberStateTooltip.message: Remember the opened state of the sidebar

BlocklistTooltip.message: URLs to disable ContextSearch with. Accepts hostnames www.example.com, wildcards  *.example.com and regex. ! or # prefix will disable an entry #example.com or !example.com

requestClipboardWritePermission.message: clipboardWrite permission is required to interact with the clipboard. Click the button below to request the clipboardWrite permission.

manualeditwarning.message: Manually editing preferences object may cause ContextSearch to stop working!

ContextAwareFilter.message: Filter search engines based on the target element ( link, image, selection, ... )

ContextsTooltip.message: Display this engine when opening menus from the selected contexts. Works with Context and Quick menus when [Context Menu / Quick Menu] -> Advanced -> Filter Engines is enabled, otherwise ignored.

OpenOnIconTooltip.message: Display an icon next to selected text. Click to open menu.

checkContextMenuOrderNotification.message: Move the default context menu to double-click when opening the quick menu? See options for more info.

ShowDefaultMenuModifierMessage.message: To show the default context menu

PostAppScriptTooltip.message: Javascript to execute in the current tab after the app completes. Stdout is captured to the variable 'result', e.g. alert(result).

MessengerOfflineTooltip.message: An additional plugin is required to launch apps from ContextSearch web-ext. Click the link for more details.

resetUserOptionsConfirm.message: Reset all preferences to default settings? ( Search Engines will not be effected )

quickMenuCloseOnEdit.message: Close menu when typing. ( Requires the search bar *NOT* have focus - see 'Search Bar' )

quickMenuOnMouseOpenWithoutSelectionTool.message: Open menu on any element including empty areas in documents and frames

CascadingFoldersToolTip.message: Browse folders in a single menu or separate cascading menus

UpdateToVersion.message: Update native app script to version $1?

TemplateCheatSheet.message:
%s - search terms
%su - search terms UPPERCASE
%sl - search terms lowercase
%d - domain
%ds - subdomain
%du - user-selected domain
%u - tab URL

confirmRestoreOldConfig.message: There was a problem loading the current preferences. Try loading an earlier version?
